          get the same prefix Request Parameters.

          Output text(contentType) to screen.

render

public static void render(java.lang.String contentType,
                          java.lang.String content,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                          java.lang.String... headers)
Output text(contentType) to screen. eg. render("text/plain", "hello", "encoding:GBK"); render("text/plain", "hello", "no-cache:false"); render("text/plain", "hello", "encoding:GBK", "no-cache:false");

参数：
contentType -
content -
headers -
